dbQuery.query: SELECT i.ili_inspection_id AS CODE , CASE WHEN l.line_id =0 THEN 'Отчет не привязан и не рассчитан.' ELSE rt.DESCRIPTION END ||' ' ||CASE WHEN l.line_id = 0 THEN ir.DESCRIPTION ELSE l.DESCRIPTION end||', '||s.station_begin||' - '||s.station_end||' км' ||' ('|| coalesce((select ss.station from pods.ili_data d,pods.event_range ee,pods.station_point ss where ee.event_id=d.event_id and ee.station_id_begin=ss.station_id and d.ili_inspection_id=i.ili_inspection_id and d.absolute_odometer= (select min(absolute_odometer) from pods.ili_Data dd where dd.ili_inspection_id=i.ili_inspection_id and dd.event_id>0) limit 1)::varchar,'НД')||' - ' ||coalesce((select ss.station from pods.ili_data d,pods.event_range ee,pods.station_point ss where ee.event_id=d.event_id and ee.station_id_begin=ss.station_id and d.ili_inspection_id=i.ili_inspection_id and d.absolute_odometer= (select max(absolute_odometer) from pods.ili_Data dd where dd.ili_inspection_id=i.ili_inspection_id and dd.event_id>0) limit 1)::varchar,'НД')||'), ' || to_char(i.begin_date,'DD.MM.YY') ||', ' ||iv.description||', '||i.ili_inspection_id DESCR FROM pods.ili_inspection i JOIN pods.ili_inspection_range ir ON i.ili_inspection_id = ir.ili_inspection_id JOIN pods.ili_tool_vendor_cl iv ON i.tool_vendor_cl = iv.code JOIN pods.event_range e ON ir.event_id = e.event_id JOIN pods.station_point spb ON e.station_id_begin = spb.station_id and spb.station_id>0 JOIN pods.series s ON s.route_id= spb.route_id JOIN pods.route r ON r.route_id = spb.route_id JOIN pods.route_type_cl rt ON r.type_cl = rt.code JOIN pods.line l ON l.line_id = r.line_id /* WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pods.station_point sp JOIN pods.location lc ON sp.location_id = lc.location_id WHERE sp.series_id = s.series_id AND CASE WHEN lc.srv_district_gcl IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE lc.srv_district_gcl END IN ({LPU_ACCESS_FILTER}) AND ((0 IN ({LPU_ACCESS_FILTER})) OR ((0 NOT IN ({LPU_ACCESS_FILTER})) AND (l.line_id != 0))) AND i.ili_inspection_id in ({ILI_INSP_FILTER}) AND l.line_id IN ({LINE_ID}))*/ where i.ili_inspection_id in (select ili_inspection_id from pods.ili_data where event_id>0) ORDER BY RT.DESCRIPTION,l.description,s.station_begin,spb.station

dbCommand.query: INSERT INTO PODS.ILI_INSPECTION( BEGIN_DATE ,END_DATE ,START_ODOMETER ,END_ODOMETER ,TOOL_TYPE_CL ,TOOL_VENDOR_CL ,MODEL ,SENSOR_GCL ,SENSOR_SPACING_MIN ,SENSOR_SPACING_MAX ,MIN_TEMP ,MAX_TEMP ,AVG_TEMP ,MIN_VELOCITY ,MAX_VELOCITY ,AVG_VELOCITY ,SAMPLING_FREQUENCY ,RESOLUTION ,RATED_MAX_VELOCITY ,RATED_MAX_WT ,CLUSTER_RULE_CL ,SOURCE_GCL ,COMMENTS ) VALUES( to_date('{BEGIN_DATE}', 'DD.MM.YYYY') ,to_date('{END_DATE}', 'DD.MM.YYYY') ,'{START_ODOMETER}' ,'{END_ODOMETER}' ,'{TOOL_TYPE_CL}' ,'{TOOL_VENDOR_CL}' ,'{MODEL}' ,'{SENSOR_GCL}' ,'{SENSOR_SPACING_MIN}' ,'{SENSOR_SPACING_MAX}' ,'{MIN_TEMP}' ,'{MAX_TEMP}' ,'{AVG_TEMP}' ,'{MIN_VELOCITY}' ,'{MAX_VELOCITY}' ,'{AVG_VELOCITY}' ,'{SAMPLING_FREQUENCY}' ,'{RESOLUTION}' ,'{RATED_MAX_VELOCITY}' ,'{RATED_MAX_WT}' ,'{CLUSTER_RULE_CL}' ,'{SOURCE_GCL}' ,'{COMMENTS}' )

UPDATE PODS.ILI_INSPECTION SET BEGIN_DATE = to_date('{BEGIN_DATE}', 'DD.MM.YYYY') ,END_DATE = to_date('{END_DATE}', 'DD.MM.YYYY') ,START_ODOMETER = '{START_ODOMETER}' ,END_ODOMETER = '{END_ODOMETER}' ,TOOL_TYPE_CL = '{TOOL_TYPE_CL}' ,TOOL_VENDOR_CL = '{TOOL_VENDOR_CL}' ,MODEL = '{MODEL}' ,SENSOR_GCL = '{SENSOR_GCL}' ,SENSOR_SPACING_MIN = '{SENSOR_SPACING_MIN}' ,SENSOR_SPACING_MAX = '{SENSOR_SPACING_MAX}' ,MIN_TEMP = '{MIN_TEMP}' ,MAX_TEMP = '{MAX_TEMP}' ,AVG_TEMP = '{AVG_TEMP}' ,MIN_VELOCITY = '{MIN_VELOCITY}' ,MAX_VELOCITY = '{MAX_VELOCITY}' ,AVG_VELOCITY = '{AVG_VELOCITY}' ,SAMPLING_FREQUENCY = '{SAMPLING_FREQUENCY}' ,RESOLUTION = '{RESOLUTION}' ,RATED_MAX_VELOCITY = '{RATED_MAX_VELOCITY}' ,RATED_MAX_WT = '{RATED_MAX_WT}' ,CLUSTER_RULE_CL = '{CLUSTER_RULE_CL}' ,SOURCE_GCL = '{SOURCE_GCL}' ,COMMENTS = '{COMMENTS}' WHERE ILI_INSPECTION_ID = '{ILI_INSPECTION_ID}';
DELETE FROM PODS.ILI_INSPECTION WHERE ILI_INSPECTION_ID = {ILI_INSPECTION_ID}

UPDATE PODS.NEAREST_FACILITY_CL SET CODE = '{CODE}' ,DESCRIPTION = '{DESCR}' ,ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF = '{ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF}' ,SOURCE_GCL = '{SOURCE_GCL}' WHERE CODE = '{CODE}'
DELETE from PODS.NEAREST_FACILITY_CL WHERE CODE = '{CODE}'

dbQuery.query: WITH select_grants AS (SELECT 1 x FROM WEB50. B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND ((EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_DATA' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = '1') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p. POLICY_ID = pr. POLICY_ID WHERE r2p. role_id = u2r. role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_PHYSICAL_INSPECTION' )) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_PHYSICAL_INSPECTION' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = '1'))) (SELECT i.event_id CODE ,i.description DESCR FROM pods.physical_inspection i WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM select_grants ) AND i.event_id = -90 UNION ALL SELECT I.EVENT_ID AS CODE, CASE i.event_id WHEN -90 THEN i.description ELSE RT.DESCRIPTION || ' ' || L.DESCRIPTION || ' ' || S.STATION_BEGIN || '-' || S.STATION_END || ' км. ' || CAST (I.INSPECTION_START_DATE AS VARCHAR (20)) || ' ' || C.DESCRIPTION END DESCR FROM pods.physical_inspection i JOIN pods.inspection_type_gcl c ON c.code = i.inspection_type_gcl JOIN pods.event_range er ON er.event_id = i.event_id JOIN pods.station_point sp ON sp.station_id = er.station_id_begin JOIN pods.series s ON s.series_id = sp.series_id JOIN pods.route r ON r.route_id = s.route_id JOIN pods.route_type_cl rt ON rt.code = r.type_cl JOIN pods.line l ON r.line_id = l.line_id WHERE i.event_id != -90 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM select_grants ) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pods.event_range e JOIN pods.station_point sp1 ON sp1.station_id = e.station_id_begin JOIN pods.station_point sp2 ON sp2.station_id = e.station_id_end JOIN pods.route r1 ON r1.route_id = sp1.route_id AND r1.line_id != 0 JOIN pods.route r2 ON r2.route_id = sp2.route_id AND r2.line_id = r1.line_id JOIN pods.route r ON r.route_id IN (r1.route_id , r2.route_id ) OR (r.line_id = r1.line_id AND r.sequence > r1.sequence AND r2.sequence > r.sequence) JOIN pods.series s ON s.route_id = r.route_id JOIN pods.station_point sp ON sp.series_id = s.series_id AND sp.type_cl IN ('ST_POINT_TYPE_01', 'ST_POINT_TYPE_02','ST_POINT_TYPE_03' ) AND (r.route_id !=r1.route_id OR sp.measure >= sp1.measure ) AND (r.route_id !=r2.route_id OR sp.measure <= sp2.measure ) JOIN PODS.LOCATION l ON sp.LOCATION_ID = l.LOCATION_ID WHERE e.event_id = er.event_id AND CASE WHEN l.srv_district_gcl IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE l.srv_district_gcl END IN ({LPU_ACCESS_FILTER})) AND coalesce(r.line_id, 0) IN ({LINE_ID}) ) ORDER BY DESCR

SELECT d.event_id CODE ,lt.description || ' ' || ln.description || ' ' || CAST(ROUND(sp1.station,1) AS VARCHAR(20)) || '-' || CAST(ROUND(sp2.station,1) AS VARCHAR(20)) || ' км. ' || ' ' || case when to_char(d.inspection_date ,'MM')::numeric <7 then to_char(d.inspection_date ,'YYYY')||' год, 1 полугодие '||ct.description else to_char(d.inspection_date ,'YYYY')||' год, 2 полугодие '||ct.description end||', '||e.event_id DESCR FROM PODS.PI_CP_INSPECTION d JOIN PODS.EVENT_RANGE e ON e.EVENT_ID = d.EVENT_ID AND e.CURRENT_INDICATOR_LF = 'Y' and to_char(d.inspection_date,'YYYY')::numeric >= 2019 JOIN pods.STATION_POINT sp1 ON sp1.STATION_ID = e.STATION_ID_BEGIN JOIN pods.STATION_POINT sp2 ON sp2.STATION_ID = e.STATION_ID_END JOIN pods.line ln ON ln.line_id = sp1.line_id and coalesce(ln.line_id, 0) in ({LINE_ID}) JOIN pods.line_type_cl lt ON lt.code = ln.type_cl join pods.cp_type_cl ct on d.type_cl=ct.code ORDER BY DESCR,CODE

WITH select_grants AS (SELECT 1 x FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND ((EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_DATA' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = '1') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_COATING_CONDITION_CL')) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_COATING_CONDITION_CL' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = '1'))) SELECT CODE, DESCRIPTION AS DESCR, ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF, SOURCE_GCL FROM PODS.COATING_CONDITION_CL WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM select_grants) ORDER BY DESCR

dbQuery.query: SELECT line_id CODE ,ln.description DESCR ,lt.description TYPE_CL ,ln.designator ,ln.product_type_scl ,ln.product_subtype_scl ,ln.operating_status_gcl ,ln.system_type_cl ,ln.interstate_lf FROM PODS.LINE ln JOIN pods.line_type_cl lt ON lt.code = ln.type_cl WHERE ln.DESCRIPTION IS NOT NULL ORDER BY lt.code,LOWER(ln.DESCRIPTION)

dbCommand.query: INSERT INTO pods.LINE ( LINE_GUID ,DESIGNATOR ,DESCRIPTION ,TYPE_CL ,PRODUCT_TYPE_SCL ,PRODUCT_SUBTYPE_SCL ,OPERATING_STATUS_GCL ,SYSTEM_TYPE_CL ,INTERSTATE_LF) VALUES ( NULL, '{DESIGNATOR}', '{DESCR}', coalesce((SELECT lt.code FROM pods.line_type_cl lt WHERE lower(lt.description)=lower('{TYPE_CL}') ),'НЕ НАШЛИ!'), '{PRODUCT_TYPE_SCL}', '{PRODUCT_SUBTYPE_SCL}', '{OPERATING_STATUS_GCL}', '{SYSTEM_TYPE_CL}', '{INTERSTATE_LF}');

UPDATE pods.LINE SET DESIGNATOR = '{DESIGNATOR}' ,DESCRIPTION = '{DESCR}' ,TYPE_CL = coalesce((SELECT lt.code FROM pods.line_type_cl lt WHERE lower(lt.description)=lower('{TYPE_CL}') ),'НЕ НАШЛИ!') ,PRODUCT_TYPE_SCL = '{PRODUCT_TYPE_SCL}' ,PRODUCT_SUBTYPE_SCL = '{PRODUCT_SUBTYPE_SCL}' ,OPERATING_STATUS_GCL = '{OPERATING_STATUS_GCL}' ,SYSTEM_TYPE_CL = '{SYSTEM_TYPE_CL}' ,INTERSTATE_LF = '{INTERSTATE_LF}' WHERE LINE_ID = '{CODE}';
DELETE FROM PODS.LINE WHERE LINE_ID = '{CODE}';

dbQuery.query: WITH select_grants AS (SELECT 1 x FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND ((EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_DATA' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = '1') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_ROUTE')) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_ROUTE' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = '1'))) SELECT route_id CODE ,description DESCR FROM pods.route r WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM select_grants) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pods.series s JOIN pods.station_point sp ON sp.series_id = s.series_id JOIN pods.location l ON sp.location_id = l.location_id WHERE r.route_id = s.route_id AND l.srv_district_gcl IN ({LPU_ACCESS_FILTER})) ORDER BY descr

dbQuery.query: SELECT i.ili_inspection_id AS CODE , CASE WHEN l.line_id =0 THEN 'Отчет не привязан и не рассчитан.' ELSE rt.DESCRIPTION END ||' ' ||CASE WHEN l.line_id = 0 THEN ir.DESCRIPTION ELSE l.DESCRIPTION end||', '||s.station_begin||' - '||s.station_end||' км' ||' ('|| coalesce((select ss.station from pods.ili_data d,pods.event_range ee,pods.station_point ss where ee.event_id=d.event_id and ee.station_id_begin=ss.station_id and d.ili_inspection_id=i.ili_inspection_id and d.absolute_odometer= (select min(absolute_odometer) from pods.ili_Data dd where dd.ili_inspection_id=i.ili_inspection_id) limit 1)::varchar,'НД')||' - ' ||coalesce((select ss.station from pods.ili_data d,pods.event_range ee,pods.station_point ss where ee.event_id=d.event_id and ee.station_id_begin=ss.station_id and d.ili_inspection_id=i.ili_inspection_id and d.absolute_odometer= (select max(absolute_odometer) from pods.ili_Data dd where dd.ili_inspection_id=i.ili_inspection_id) limit 1)::varchar,'НД')||'), ' || to_char(i.begin_date,'DD.MM.YY') ||', ' ||iv.description||', '||i.ili_inspection_id DESCR FROM pods.ili_inspection i JOIN pods.ili_inspection_range ir ON i.ili_inspection_id = ir.ili_inspection_id JOIN pods.ili_tool_vendor_cl iv ON i.tool_vendor_cl = iv.code JOIN pods.event_range e ON ir.event_id = e.event_id JOIN pods.station_point spb ON e.station_id_begin = spb.station_id JOIN pods.station_point spe ON e.station_id_end = spe.station_id JOIN pods.series s ON s.route_id= spb.route_id JOIN pods.route r ON r.route_id = spb.route_id JOIN pods.route_type_cl rt ON r.type_cl = rt.code JOIN pods.line l ON l.line_id = r.line_id WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pods.station_point sp JOIN pods.location lc ON sp.location_id = lc.location_id WHERE sp.series_id = s.series_id AND CASE WHEN lc.srv_district_gcl IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE lc.srv_district_gcl END IN ({LPU_ACCESS_FILTER}) AND ((0 IN ({LPU_ACCESS_FILTER})) OR ((0 NOT IN ({LPU_ACCESS_FILTER})) AND (l.line_id != 0))) AND i.ili_inspection_id in ({ILI_INSP_FILTER}) AND l.line_id IN ({LINE_ID})) AND ((spb.station<={START_KM} and {START_KM}<=spe.station) or (spb.station>={START_KM} and spe.station<={FINISH_KM}) or (spb.station<={FINISH_KM} and {FINISH_KM}<=spe.station)) ORDER BY RT.DESCRIPTION,l.description,s.station_begin,spb.station
